articles.description: Former Pakistan leg-spinner Danish Kaneria was the latest to share his thoughts on the unique role of Dinesh Karthik in India's T20I team. Kaneria had little doubts that Karthik is well and truly in India's scheme of things for the T20 World Cup in Australia …
articles.content: Dinesh Karthik is at an interesting stage in his career. Even 10 months ago, nobody was talking about him. In fact, he was doing all the talking as a broadcaster. On the cricket field, very few thing… [+2427 chars]
